body.name: RONGJIA 3-Tier Natural Bamboo Shoe Rack - Stackable Storage Shelf with Multi-Function Combinations - Free Standing Shoe Racks for Convenient Shoe Organization（Natural） 11" D x 27" W x 20" H
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 19 mins
features: RONGJIA High-quality bamboo material: Our bamboo shoe rack is made of high-quality natural bamboo material, which has excellent durability and sturdiness. Bamboo is an eco-friendly material that not only brings natural beauty to your home environment but also reduces its impact on the environment.

Large capacity storage: Our bamboo shoe rack features a multi-layered design, with each layer capable of holding multiple pairs of shoes,. Additionally, each layer is designed with the right height to accommodate different types of shoes, making it highly practical.

Easy to clean and maintain: Our bamboo shoe rack features a smooth surface and high-quality craftsmanship, making it not only easy to clean but also durable. Just wipe it with a damp cloth to keep it clean.

Versatility: In addition to storing shoes, a bamboo shoe rack can also be used as a decorative shelf or home organizer for other purposes. Its simple design and beautiful appearance suit various home decor styles.

Space-saving: Our bamboo shoe rack is perfect for small homes, with its vertical design saving valuable floor space. You can place it in small spaces like hallways, entryways, or next to your closet to make your home more tidy and organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The rack is sturdy and has good height between the levels. I will mention that there is some splintering on the vertical pieces so be careful when assembling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for my need
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack looks great and is the perfect size for my small entry way. It holds 6 pairs of shoes (size 10+). Looks sleek and keeps the entry way organized. The assembly was quick and easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little shoe rack for the space
reviews.reviewText: This rack fit in the space perfectly and was very easy to assemble. It is relatively sturdy. That being said, when I pick it up, the levels come apart easily as well! Not a big problem as I don't intend to move it around, but something to know. There were 2 extra dowels. I cut them in half and used them to fill in the holes in the top shelve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This helped me declutter my closet! It was easy to assemble and fit just how measurements said. I feel like it is sturdy enough. Stacking my flats on top of eachother I can fit 6 to 8 shoes per tier. 3 to 4 pairs of boots on top and 3 pairs of sneakers underneath!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect black shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: Use for sneakers in garage. Durable and easy to assemble. Looks nice and specifically looked for bamboo. It also compliments a taller boot rack I bought from a different seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Functional and a decent value, but the pictures are optimistic
reviews.reviewText: Overall, the shoe rack meets my needs and the price was fair. Assembly was not too bad, but I would recommend waiting to tighten any one fastener until all of them are loosely assembled.What the pictures do not show is that the flat portion the shoes sit on, is actually two pieces hinged in the middle. I understand this makes it a lot more shipping friendly, but the alignment of the hinges is less than perfect. This causes the 'flat' portions to really not quite be flat, and the entire assembly to warp a bit when you fold it flat. You can tell one hinge is happier than the other etc. and the whole thing seems to be fighting itself under some kind of tension when assembled, and is not quite flat.I have to knock off a couple of stars, because the execution on the hinge design is not good enough to give them a pass on using factually wrong photos that clearly show a continuous single piece shelf, which is not what I got with the dark colored two-tier model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice but not to strong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shoe Storage: Stacking Up, Literally!
reviews.reviewText: The RONGJIA 3-Tier Natural Bamboo Shoe Rack is the Jenga of shoe organizers – stackable, versatile, and ready to play the storage game. Holding a respectable number of shoes, this rack allows you to fold each section.The multi-function combinations are like shoe Tetris; you can either make it larger by stacking more or separate it into sections to make it a shoe microcosm. It's the Lego of shoe racks, and your shoes are the building blocks.Now, let's talk about the elephant in the room: the material. The bamboo gives it that natural, eco-friendly vibe, but let's not kid ourselves – it looks a bit on the cheap side. It's like the fast fashion of shoe racks. I haven't had it long enough to comment on the quality, but I'm crossing my fingers and hoping it holds up better than my last pair of sneakers.In the grand scheme of shoe storage, the RONGJIA Bamboo Shoe Rack is like the Swiss Army knife – it does the job, has some cool tricks up its sleeve, but the jury's still out on long-term durability. If you're looking for a budget-friendly, customizable shoe storage solution and aren't planning to put it through a stress test, give it a shot. It's the shoe rack that's reaching for the stars, one stack at a time
The rack has to be moved very carefully as it is somewhat on the flimsy side, however seems to be able to hold shoes and function as advertised, so am keeping it.
